meanings.definition: The highest point or peak of something.
meanings.sent1: Reaching the tiptops of the mountain was a challenging but rewarding experience.
meanings.sent2: The hiker finally made it to the tiptops of the hill after a long climb.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel climbed to the tiptops of the tree to escape the barking dog.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement soared to the tiptops when she received the good news.
meanings.sent5: The sun set behind the tiptops of the skyscrapers, painting the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The best or most excellent part of something.
meanings.sent1: The tiptops of the cake were decorated with colorful frosting and sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The tiptops of the movie were the thrilling action sequences.
meanings.sent3: She saved the tiptops of the chocolate bar for last as a special treat.
meanings.sent4: His performance in the play reached the tiptops of excellence, earning him a standing ovation.
meanings.sent5: The tiptops of her painting skills were showcased in the beautiful landscape she created.
